column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The Blueberry Patch cocktail was very nice (blueberry vodka
column5: although a little light on the alcohol. Kind of like a blueberry mojito. The free bread was also tasty
column6: and the tapas were quite good. The best were the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column9: and the rioja-braised short ribs w/ mashed potatoes. The seared spanish sausages (chorizo
column11: butifarra y morcilla) and the beef skewer
column12: horseradish cream & red onions were solid
column13: but by the time they arrived we were already stuffed.
